propertyFields.name: id?
propertyFields.description: An identification string which will be generated on its creation

propertyFields.name: description
propertyFields.description: Brief description of the condition, e.g. explaining what it will be used for

propertyFields.name: propertyKey
propertyFields.description: Property key of the event, e.g. eventType

propertyFields.name: propertyValue
propertyFields.description: Value to be expected when matching the propertyKey with the given predicate

propertyFields.name: labels?
propertyFields.description: Representing meaningful identifiers, which enable custom displaying & filtering capabilities

propertyFields.name: mandatory?
propertyFields.description:
Explicitly set which conditions must be mandatory. If not set conditions will be treated as follows:
- Conditions with different property keys will be evaluated with the AND operator
- Conditions with the same property key will be evaluated with OR operator
